headline.main: Petain Defended; Marshal, It Is Asserted, Has Been Misquoted

lead_paragraph: TO THE EDITOR OF THE NEW YORK TIMES: In his letter in THE NEW YORK TIMES of July 20, Henry Bernstein makes certain statements concerning Marshal Petain which may sadly mislead the American people.
abstract: lr defending Petain against H Bernstein statements
